column5: Not having much luck finding a local supplier of Sunbrella material in Hamilton area. No one seems to have any in stock (I'm not picky on color) and must order it in. I could order it also but hoped for somewhere local, just need 6 yrds.  Any help would be very appreciated.
Try this guy Quality Trim The Top Shop. Jim 905 545 5026 209 Vansitmart Ave Hamilton He made a travel cover for my boat and did a great job.
Thank you! Will give a call.
